attributes.action: Sort out over 65’s being able to prove they have had a Covid booster jab
attributes.additional_details: Affecting many many many people who have made plans for winter/spring holidays.
attributes.background: Must be able to prove this as now unable to travel to EU, travel on rules transport or enter any public place

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about providing evidence of medical treatment, including vaccinations, are a matter for the NHS, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
